title: *individuo*
abstract: CONTRIBUTI IN CONTO CAPITALE PER LA REALIZZAZIONE DI UN INVESTIMENTO INIZIALE (ART. 2 REG (CE) 651/2014). DOTAZIONE FINANZIARIA: Â¬ 70.000.000,00. BENEFICIARI: PICCOLE E MEDIE IMPRESE IN FORMA SINGOLA O ASSOCIATA AD ECCEZIONE DEI DISTRETTI E RETI DI IMPRESA. SPESE AMMISSIBILI:INVESTIMENTI MATERIALI (TERRENI-IMMOBILI-OPERE MURARIE-IMPIANTI-MACCHINARI-ATTREZZATURE) - INVESTIMENTI IMMATERIALI (BREVETTI, LICENZE. KNOW HOW)-SERVIZI DI CONSULENZA.

objectives: Provide financial contributions to support the initial investment of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs).
methods: Offer a financial endowment of €70,000,000.00 to support SMEs.
Allow eligible expenses for material investments (e.g., land, buildings, machinery) and immaterial investments (e.g., patents, licenses, know-how).
llama_json.research_subject: Financial support for small and medium-sized enterprises

motivations: There is a need for capital contributions for the realization of an initial investment.
objectives: Provide financial support to small and medium-sized enterprises for initial investments.
methods: Allocate financial resources for material investments such as land, buildings, machinery, and equipment.
Allocate financial resources for immaterial investments such as patents, licenses, and know-how.
results: Enable small and medium-sized enterprises to make initial investments in material and immaterial assets.
openai_json.research_subject: Capital contributions for initial investments in small and medium-sized enterprises

motivations: Small and medium enterprises need financial support to realize initial investments and enhance their competitiveness.
objectives: Provide capital contributions to small and medium enterprises for initial investment projects in accordance with EU Regulation 651/2014.
methods: Allocate financial resources through capital grants to eligible enterprises for approved investment categories.
results: Enable small and medium enterprises to acquire material and immaterial assets necessary for business development and growth.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Capital contribution program for initial investments by small and medium enterprises
